🕒 Meal Timing (Can be adjusted based on your schedule) 🌅 Breakfast (7:00–8:00 AM) 2 boiled eggs / scrambled eggs
1 slice whole grain toast / oats
1 cup milk or green tea
1 banana or apple
☀️ Mid-Morning Snack (10:30–11:00 AM) Handful of nuts (almonds/walnuts)
Seasonal fruits
🍽️ Lunch (1:00–2:00 PM) 1 cup rice or 2 whole wheat chapatis
Grilled chicken / lentils / fish
Mixed vegetable curry or salad
Yogurt or buttermilk
🌤️ Evening Snack (4:30–5:30 PM) Green tea or black coffee
Roasted chana or boiled corn
🌙 Dinner (7:30–8:30 PM) 1–2 chapatis or 1 cup rice
Cooked vegetables
Light protein: paneer, tofu, eggs, or lean chicken
Salad (cucumber, carrot, tomato)
🛏️ Before Bed (Optional) 1 glass warm milk (optional)
